title: The Vote Trader
description: Hector is a gray-market financier in Brooklyn. He loves money and Sarah, a political operative working to remove New York's corrupt senior Senator. When New York allows its citizens to buy and sell votes in political elections, Hector dives face-first into the turbulent surf of money and power. Hijinks ensue, as Hector encounters issues of community and humanity that might supersede profit.
author: Roger Alan Bonner
